select_battle_option.description: Calculates and executes the button presses needed to select a specific option from the main battle menu (FIGHT, PKMN, ITEM, RUN).
select_battle_option.python_script:
option = input_data['option_to_select']
options = ["FIGHT", "PKMN", "ITEM", "RUN"]
current_pos = 0 # Assume cursor starts on FIGHT
presses = []
target_pos = options.index(option)
# Simplified logic: Assume cursor moves right and down
if target_pos == 1: # PKMN
    presses.append('Right')
elif target_pos == 2: # ITEM
    presses.append('Down')
elif target_pos == 3: # RUN
    presses.append('Right')
    presses.append('Down')
presses.append('A')
import json
print(json.dumps(presses))
